version_description: * bug fix for VPN configuration always occupied by Thor

* fix compatibility on iOS 10.3
* add packet filter in session packets list
* add bookmark groups to group packets
* support iPad spilt screen

* crash fix for packet
* fix compatibility on iOS 10.3
* add packet filter in session packets list
* add bookmark groups to group packets
* support iPad spilt screen

* HTTPS decryption added
* widget of today improved
* known bugs fixed

* pictures preview in packet list
* sessions batch delete supported
* data size display in packet list
* URL Scheme opened
* more entries to export sniffer data
* improve POST tracing
* bug fixed

* fix VPN turning off immediately in some wifi network
* improve http traffics decoding
* inverse supported in packet list
* status code supported in packet filter
* better audio/video player
* improve http body parsing
* better unzip p

* fix sniffing turn off immediately after started in some wifi
* all kinds of files in other App can be previewed by opened in Thor
* packets can be ordered by time descending and size descending
* 3D touch supported: filer item in home page, pa

* HTTP pipelining supported
* Session filter > Match domains support IP address
* Display session duration in history sessions

* dispay thumbnail of audio and video in packet list
* batch preview and export for picture, audio and video
* certificate preview, format convert and export（der, pem, p12, ...）
* installation of SSL CA improved
* sniffer improved
* bugs fi

* bug fixed for SSL CA installation
* bug fixed for Tell friend freezing GUI
* lz4 decompression supported

# Recently
* dispay thumbnail of audio and video in packet list
* batch preview and export for picture, audio and video
* cer

* keywords searching supported in packet list
* display icon and title of .ipa in packet list
* add "play from raw url" for audio and video packet
* unzip twice faster
* folder: multi-selection > export as zip
* certificate in other app

* font preview supported
* compatible with iOS11
* bug fixed

# Recently
* keywords searching supported in packet list
* certificate preview, format convert and export（der, pem, p12, ...）
* certificate in other app can be "Open in Th

* crash fixed for picture saving on iOS11
* file viewing improved
* bug fixed

# Recently
* font preview supported
* keywords searching supported in packet list
* certificate preview, format convert and export（der, pem, p12, ...）
*

* bug fixed for capturing https packet with out response
* crash fixed for picture saving on iOS11
* relay websocket traffic correctly
* file viewing improved
* bug fixed

# Recently
* font preview supported
* keywords searching su

* websocket traffic capture
* session renaming supported
* export url append request headers (can be open in "Shu")
* host list and App identifiers exporting in packet filter > custom filter
* improve packet removing performance

# R

* session filter import and export
* "Match Domain" and "Exception Domain" in session filter supported IP address and wildcards
* global search and global packet fitler supported
* add memo in packet supported
* bug fixed

# Recently

* HTTP archive export (.har)
* cURL export
* records can be cleared in active sniffer session
* customize packet filter
* improve timing data in packet detail
* history sessions grouped by date

# Recently
* session filter import

* import and export .p4thor
* export URL and cURL in packet list
* packet filter supported in bookmark
* crash fixed for armv7 devices while https decoding
* improve .har exporting performance
* other optimization

# Recently
* HTT

* newly designed home page
* packet filter support "match keywords"
* packet filters now can be embedded in session filter
* More > FQA added
* bug fixed

# Recently
* import and export .p4thor
* export URL and cURL in packet li

* add WiFi proxy to sniff other device in same LAN
* performance improves
* bug fixes

# Recently
* packet filter support "match keywords"
* packet filters now can be embedded in session filter
* import and export .p4thor
* export

* session filter & packet filter optimized
* match single record in session: swipe a record, then tap match
* tap records count in toolbar of session to edit filter with one step
* performance improves
* bug fixes

# Recently
* ad

* Extract filters with record contents: record > swipe left > More > Extract to Session filter
* Import records with .har file (.har file can be standardized by importing to Thor and then exporting a new one)
* Export requests (.p4thor file

* Fixed "Packet Filter" creating always fails

# Recently
* Extract filters with record contents: record > swipe left > More > Extract to Session filter
* Import records with .har file (.har file can be standardized by importing to Th

* support batch export for sessions
* support 3d touch in session filter list
* support all screen orientations
* breakpoint supported: session filter > breakpoints
* improve 3d touch of records item
* GUI color refactor for records: wid

* add privacy policy
* improve pipeline performance
* improve ssl auto-detecting
* improve hex viewer
* unicode domains supported in session filter, packet filter and searching
* display decoded unicode domains directly in records
* upda

* crash and bug fixes on iOS 13
* support iTunes backup
* support batch deletion in session
* tap memo icon of record item in session > show memo in popup view
* tap method name of record to quicklook request/response body
* improve data

* support dark mode
* fix text is not selectable in textView
* fix layout for iPad on iOS 11.x and earlier
* fix network not refreshed from 4G to Wi-Fi on iOS 13
* performance & stability improves

* support request/response body searching: records list > packet filter > Keywords Range
* dark mode for json/xml/html/css text highlight
* increase font size
* improve widget font color for light mode
* fix importing p12 fails from base

* improve performance of records exporting
* improve Surge request records importing
* support QX request records importing
* fix record > detail may be blank after swiping tab
* fix fields in POST form-data body with blank values disappear

* fix CA trust errors on iOS 13.5+
* fix no-global-search of RegEx in breakpoint may not work
* fix options of RegEx Validator in breakpoint editor not working
* fix "Exception Keywords" not working in session filters with breakpoints setted
*

* improves for highlight rendering of json/xml/html
* performance improves for records loading
* fix bookmark not refresh after records deleted
* fix network errors
* bug fixed for string escaping with replacement in regular expression
* b

* support Context Menu on iOS 13+
* fix capture group ($1 ~ $9) of reguler expression in breakpoint
* fix session not open with a tap
* other bug fixes & improves
